item.title: Carolann add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "But the Hebrew word, the word timshel—‘Thou mayest’— that gives a choice. It might be the most important word in the world. That says the way is open. That throws it right back on a man. For if ‘Thou mayest’—it is also true that ‘Thou mayest not." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Carolann add a quote by René Descartes
item.description: "Cogito ergo sum. <i>(I think, therefore I am.)</i>" -- René Descartes

item.title: Carolann add a quote by René Descartes
item.description: "Conquer yourself rather than the world." -- René Descartes

item.title: Carolann add a quote by René Descartes
item.description: "If you would be a real seeker after truth, it is necessary that at least once in your life you doubt, as far as possible, all things." -- René Descartes

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Plato
item.description: "Wise men speak because they have something to say; fools because they have to say something." -- Plato

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Margaret Cho
item.description: "George Bush isn't Hitler. He could be if he applied himself." -- Margaret Cho

item.title: Carolann add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "One of the great things about books is sometimes there are some fantastic pictures." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Sara Quinn
item.description: "Do you think the guy on the subway that is touching himself feels like he's spreading love? I will tell you right now there is a law against that." -- Sara Quinn

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Rilo Kiley lyric
item.description: "with every broken heart, we should become more adventurous." -- Rilo Kiley lyric

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Carrie Fisher
item.description: "Resentment is like drinking poison and waiting for the other person to die. " -- Carrie Fisher

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Peter De Vries
item.description: "Sometimes I write drunk and revise sober, and sometimes I write sober and revise drunk. But you have to have both elements in creation — the Apollonian and the Dionysian, or spontaneity and restraint, emotion and discipline." -- Peter De Vries

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "Nothing behind me, everything ahead of me, as is ever so on the road." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Jack Kerouac
item.description: "God was gone; it was the silence of his departure. It was a rainy night. It was the myth of the rainy night. Dean was popeyed with awe. This madness would lead nowhere. I didn't know what was happening to me, and I suddenly realized it was only the tea that we were smoking; Dean had bought some in New York. It made me think that everything was about to arrive - the moment when you know all and everything is decided forever." -- Jack Kerouac

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Carson McCullers
item.description: "Next to music, beer was best." -- Carson McCullers

item.title: Carolann add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "Good people drink good beer." -- Hunter S. Thompson
